title: The Black Hand: The Story of Rene "Boxer" Enriquez and His Life in the Mexican Mafia
description: “Chris Blatchford has hit a grand slam. The Black Hand is an important page turning book that will take you into a frightening dark world that shouldn’t exist… but it does. It’s riveting, and when you finish the book, you’ll get up and lock your doors. Highly recommended.”
author: Chris Blatchford
